name: My Disciples Cultivate, While I Slack Off!
author: Iciyuan
content: My family was scammed of all its money, and I was about to die and become the shortest-lived elder in the history of the sect… Luckily, my cheat code awakened, and created the Disciple Rebate System, giving my disciples trash pills and returning me the best-quality pills! I’ll Revenge first, then riches I’ll fight against the strongest immortal emperor! A gentle pharmacist, the sexy daughter of an emperor, the one best at the way of the sword… they’re all my disciples!
